testcase.name: Sentry Utilities > captureAPIError > should capture API error with context
Sentry Utilities > captureAPIError > should capture API error without context
Sentry Utilities > captureAPIError > should not capture error on server side
Sentry Utilities > captureUserAction > should record user action with data
Sentry Utilities > captureUserAction > should record user action without data
Sentry Utilities > startPerformanceTransaction > should start performance transaction
Sentry Utilities > startPerformanceTransaction > should return null on server side
Sentry Utilities > withPerformanceSpan > should execute function with performance span
Sentry Utilities > withPerformanceSpan > should execute function without span on server side
Sentry Utilities > setSentryUser > should set user information
Sentry Utilities > captureMessage > should capture message with default level
Sentry Utilities > captureMessage > should capture message with custom level
Sentry Utilities > setSentryTag > should set tag
Sentry Utilities > setSentryContext > should set context
Sentry Utilities > testProductionMonitoring > should run monitoring tests in development environment
Sentry Utilities > testProductionMonitoring > should not run monitoring tests in production environment
Sentry Utilities > captureProductionError > should capture production error with default severity
Sentry Utilities > captureProductionError > should capture critical error with fatal level
Sentry Utilities > captureProductionError > should capture high severity error with error level
Sentry Utilities > recordBusinessMetric > should record business metric with default unit
Sentry Utilities > recordBusinessMetric > should record business metric with custom unit and tags
